flavor_text:
[i]A wave of static and pain washed over the isle. In its wake, the sky fizzled and blinked out. Textured fabric faded, revealing the bare polygons beneath.
All over the Weft, lights were going out.[/i]
notes:
!tag reprint
Usef to be: Soulspace Refit

The sky was the first to fail, the pale pink sunset blinking out in squares. Nu and Gemi clutched their left sides as the dreadful pain washed over them. 
Nu reached into the Downlink and got back nothing but static and fear.

It flowed over Nu like a wave of electric pain. His left hip burned and froze. The gateway fizzled out, dropping him back onto the buffer's sandy shore.
All over the Weft, lights were going out.


New day; new me.

art4
flagged (sideboard)
